issue.title: fix: add v-show style in ssr if style is binding to an array

repository.name: vue
repository.description: This is the repo for Vue 2. For Vue 3, go to https://github.com/vuejs/core

issue.body:
web/server/directives/show just add style.display='none', no matter style is object or array; If
style is an array, it will lost additional property while tranformed into object by
shared/utils#toObject;

fix #7813
